ygData.subject: RE: Deepwater Gobs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The only way to do it is to go and kill the gobs and then observe the spawns and see if they are making pets.  If you really want a bunch of mid-20 s to
ygData.messageBody:
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> thank you! no offense of course, i always correct everyone. actually i
> have heard of people hunting pets in lake rathe and oasis, though i don't
> know of any trick or way to get shaman to spawn.
>
> Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L37 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>

The only way to do it is to go and kill the gobs and then observe the spawns
and see if they are making pets. If you really want a bunch of mid-20's to
love you, go and set up all the spawns at one of the DW Gob areas to be
shamans. The number of pets produced is staggering and can actually supply
good XP from level 23 to level 29 or so.

Taneran
